snippet.title: Slide Stars - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Are you ready for the world’s most extreme water slide adventure? Play with 20+ of the world’s biggest social media stars and blast into an adventure of a lifetime! Slide Stars is coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch this holiday season!

Pre-Order Now: https://slide-stars.com/

About Slide Stars
Slide Stars is the first water racing platform adventure in which you can play with 20+ of the world’s biggest social media stars. Players will be able to choose their favorite star, jump onto the ride of their choice, and blast through some of the world’s most crazy water slides! Slide, jump, and balance through insane tracks and overcome extreme obstacles. 

Are you ready for this extreme water slide adventure? 

Discover the full roster of playable stars now (alphabetical order):

★ Alan Stokes
★ Alex Stokes
★ Amusementforce Greg
★ Amusementforce Kes
★ ApoRed
★ Ben Azelart
★ Brent Rivera
★ Demi Rose
★ Doctor Mike
★ Enji Night
★ Enya Wandres
★ Holly H
★ Jeff Seid
★ Kat Wonders
★ Luciano Spinelli
★ Lexi Rivera
★ Milan Knol
★ Prof. Dr. Freek Vonk
★ Sveta Bilyalova
★ Veronica Bielik

All Gameplay Footage Is Captured In-Game.

Announcement Trailer
The announcement trailer for Slide Stars was directed in collaboration with Hellenthal Studios. We thank https://www.centerparcs.nl/ for accommodating their holiday park De Huttenheugte as the film set for this production. 
_____________________________________________

For More Information:

Visit the official site at http://www.slide-stars.com/
Follow us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/slidestars/
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/SlideStars
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/slidestars/
